description.en:
The “school wars” of youth are about to break out!
From the hit maker duo of Hisao Maki “Waru” & Toshio Shoji “Yuyake Bancho”.
The first book of the unprecedented soccer drama!!

Commentary
"Kake the Clouds!" is a youth soccer giant story that was started serialized in 1970 by "Shonen Champion" (Akita Shoten) to commemorate its weekly publication. Yes!
At that time, the Japanese national soccer team won the bronze medal at the Mexico Olympics (1968).
The golden duo of Kamamoto and Sugiyama was admired by all the boys.
Given the trends of the times, it seems likely to be a work with a pure sports spirit, but
It is a sharp depiction of the psychology unique to the original author Hisao Maki. Toshio Shoji, who is riding a wave with the success of ``Yuyake Bancho'', dares to draw in a gekiga style, resulting in an exciting and unconventional work that goes beyond the conventional genre of sports spirit.

Synopsis
Tetsuya Kokubu, a student yakuza who made a name for himself in the Ginza/Yurakucho area, graduated from university with the aim of realizing his dreams.
At the same time, he left the group and was assigned to a high school in Aomori as a teacher.
However, the high school is a veritable chaos ruled by a mysterious group of delinquents known as the Blood Alliance, who use ninjutsu skills.
Kokubu sees a piece of his dream in their cohesiveness, and tries to ask for their cooperation, sometimes confronting them head-on, and sometimes using psychological warfare!
Eventually, he realizes the existence of a mastermind manipulating the Blood Pact behind the scenes...
What is the true identity of the mastermind?
What is the "dream" that Kokubun continues to burn with passion?!?

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/雲をけとばせ！-大合本-ゴマブックス×ナンバーナイン-真樹日佐夫-ebook/dp/B09NYM5VL6
